message: why do people say that fortnite is toxic, there literally isnt any proximity chat or ingame text chat or any of that, league of legends is 100x more toxic generally
reason: The message compares the toxicity of Fortnite and League of Legends, stating that Fortnite does not have proximity chat or in-game text chat, making it less toxic. It highlights the comparison with League of Legends, which is stated to be much more toxic.
label: toxic
